2934:466: na hi sūcichidraṃ chidram ity evākāśenāpi sāmyam anubhavati|
2934:468: yac cānuttaraṃ samyaksambodhisukham iti? 86 uktam etat|
2934:471: tasmāt tad apy anenaiva krameṇa boddhavyam|
2934:472: 87 tat kiṃ pāramitānaye na bodhiḥ? 88 naivam|
2934:473: prajñāpāramitayā vinā kuto'nuttarāyāḥ samyak- sambodher gandho'pi|
2934:474: paraṃ paryante'py avaśyam etam upāyam apekṣata ity ucyata ity alam ativistareṇa|
2934:476: 89 mahāsukhasādhanatvena pradhānaṃ sparśaviṣayaṃ tadindriyaṃ tajjñānaṃ ca karuṇādirūpaṃ pañcaprajñārūpaṃ ca pratipādayitum āha- ata ityādi|
2934:477: 90 bāhyaprajñāyāḥ kāyasya viṣayasya tadyogād ādhyātmi- kakāyajñānayoś ca śodhanād yad bhavati tad vakṣyāmi dṛṣṭi- yuktam iti|
2934:486: vinā tu mahāmudrāyogaṃ badhyate jagad ity āha - darśanād ityādi|
2934:491: śūnyatayā vinā karuṇādayo'pi na muktihetava iti bhāvaḥ|
2934:494: 95 evam abhyāsaparasya yathāmilitāhārasaṃskāram āha- yad ityādi|
2934:496: 96 na kevalaṃ tad ratikrīḍādikaṃ ca mahāmudrāpi mahāmudrārūpaṃ draṣṭavyam,
2934:505: 99 nanv āsāṃ paramā pūjā kamanam eva, sa ca doṣaḥ|
2934:515: tatra tattvarūpātmasamāropasya mātrādisamāropavat pāraṃparyeṇa bodhisādhanatvād adoṣaḥ|
2934:516: 102 nanu keṣāṃcid anubhavasyāpi niṣiddhatvād virodhaḥ syāt |
2934:525: (36) 103 mahāmudrādvayayogayuktaś ca yogī sakalam alobhādyāt- makaṃ jagad avalokayati|
2934:526: tato'sau sarveryāpathasaṃyuto'py akuśalānupalambharūpatvāt kuśalātmaivety āha- sa yogītyādi|
2934:529: tasmāt prajñopāyasvabhāvādvayabodhicittabhāva- naiva sarvapāpaviśodhanī sarvaśreyaskarī ca|
2934:530: 105 tad uktam āryanāgārjunapādaiḥ- mahāyānam idaṃ śreṣṭhaṃ bodhicittam idaṃ param|
2934:535: 106 evaṃ ca vijñātavyam- ayaṃ sa paramo yogas tasmād vandyas tathāgataiḥ|
2934:539: śāntikaṃ pauṣṭikaṃ karma yad anyad api mantrajam|
2934:543: yac ca nirvedhabhāgīyaṃ caturdhā bhūmayo daśa|
2934:544: phalāvasthā ca sarvaṃ tad yogād asmāt samut- thitam||
2934:545: bhūtā ye ca bhaviṣyanti bhavanti jinasūnavaḥ|
2934:546: lokeśādyā mahāsattvās te'py atraiva vyavasthi- tāḥ||
2934:547: atītānāgatā buddhā vartamānā matāś ca ye|
2934:550: tāvantaḥ sarva etasmād yogād eva vinirgatāḥ||
2934:552: yāvantaḥ sthiracalā bhāvās tāvantas tad- apāśrayāḥ||
2934:554: 107 pañcakāmān vinā nīrasaiva śūnyatā syād ity āha- yāvetyādi|
2934:555: yāvan na viṣayarasaiḥ paripālyate bodhicittāṅkuras tāvan na buddhakāyakalpataruḥ prādurbhavati,
2934:557: 108 tad uktaṃ sarahapādaiḥ- tanutaracittāṅkurako viṣayarasair yadi na sicy- ate śuddhaiḥ|
2934:559: (39) iti paṇḍitābhayākaraguptakṛtāyām abhayapaddhatyāṃ śrībuddhakāpalamahātantraṭīkāyāṃ trayodaśaḥ paṭalaḥ||
2934:560: (40) 14 jāpamudrādhyeṣaṇāsarvatantranidānapaṭala 1 abhimataniruttarārthadeśanayā saṃjātaprasādātiśayā yathā stuvanti tad darśayitum āha- athetyādi|
2934:579: 15 ekaruteneti na tu prathamaṃ durbodham abhidhāya va- canāntaraiḥ prakaṭitā|
2934:588: yatas teṣāṃ hetuphalātmako ji- navarair vineyeṣu gopitaḥ sudurlabho'rthaḥ sugūḍhago- care'smiṃs tantre mayā prakaṭīkṛtaḥ|
2934:591: ato manmukhena tair eva kṛtā deśaneyam iti bhāvaḥ|
2934:592: 23 mayi ca viparītadeśanāparādhādhyāropād akṣamā na kartavyety āha- kṣamaṃtu,
2934:594: 24 sarvatantram uktvābhiṣiktānām evātrādhikāra iti darśayituṃ paryante'bhiṣekavidhim āha-athetyādi|
2934:601: 29 kim evam prajñātoṣaṇe yatna ity āha- sarvabuddhaiḥ pūjitā|
2934:602: hetuphalāvasthayoḥ karmamudrāyogenaiva hi mahāmudrāsiddhir ity āmnāyaḥ|
2934:603: 30 katham evam ity āha- atraiva prajñāyāṃ sthitā buddhādayaḥ|
2934:607: 31 ata eva prajñājñānasya svarūpaṃ pratipādayati- (43) indītyādi|
2934:612: 34 sarvam idam asvabhāvaṃ yatra nopalabhyate sā paramā- nandagatiḥ|
2934:615: 35 tad uktaṃ dvikalpatantre- paramānande tu saṃprāpte nānātvavarjite kṣaṇe|
2934:619: 37 paramānandam eva hetutvena namasyati- tasmā ityādi|
2934:623: yaś cābhyāsān nirvedhabhāgīyā- dyadhigamakrameṇābhinandā samantato'bhijñābala- vaiśāradyādibhir atiśayaguṇaratnaiḥ samṛddhā jinānāṃ nikhilakleśakalaṅkāpagamāt sundarī samantabhadrā paramaprītivasatir mūrtiś caturthaḥ kāyo vajradharaḥ,
2934:624: paṇḍitānāṃ samyaksambuddhānāṃ hṛdi tādātmyena saka- lavikalpavikṣepapratikṣepān nibhṛtaṃ ko'py avāgbuddhigo- caraḥ- ata evainam adhigamya citrasenādīnāṃ tūṣṇīṃbhāve- na vyavasthānaṃ vakṣyati- eko'dvayaḥ paramānandaḥ sar- vāvaraṇavāsanāvaśeṣanidrāvirahāj jāgarti,
2934:626: 40 tad anena ślokena tad eva prajñājñānaṃ rūpaviśeṣeṇa jalam iva taraṅgarūpeṇotpannaṃ caturtho'bhiṣeka ity uktam|
2934:627: sa punar ayaṃ mahāsukhamayo vajradharaḥ sarvatantranidā- nam|
2934:628: iti paṇḍitābhayākaraguptakṛtāyām abhayapaddhatyāṃ śrībuddhakapālamahātantraṭīkāyāṃ caturdaśaḥ paṭalaḥ samāptaḥ|
